SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.oracle.tools.runtime.java
Interface JavaApplication<A>

All Superinterfaces:
Application<A>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJavaApplication, SimpleJavaApplication
public interface JavaApplication<A>
extends Application<A>

A JavaApplication is an Application for Java-based application processes that use system properties in addition to environment variables as provided by regular Applications.

Author:
Brian Oliver
See Also:
Application,

Copyright (c) 2011. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Method Detail

getSystemProperties

Properties getSystemProperties()
Obtains the system Properties that were supplied to the JavaApplication when it was realized.

Returns:
a Properties of name value pairs, each one representing a system property provided to the JavaApplication as -Dname=value parameters when it was realized

getSystemProperty

String getSystemProperty(String name)
Obtains an individual system property value for a specified system property name, or null if the property is undefined.

Parameters:
name - the name of the system property
Returns:
the value of the defined system property, or null if undefined

isJMXEnabled

boolean isJMXEnabled()
Determines if JMX has been configured and is enabled for the JavaApplication.

Returns:
true if enabled, false otherwise

getDeferredJMXConnector

Deferred<JMXConnector> getDeferredJMXConnector()
Obtains the Deferred for the JMXConnector to the JavaApplication.

Returns:
the Deferred of the JMXConnector

getDeferredMBeanAttribute

<T> Deferred<T> getDeferredMBeanAttribute(ObjectName objectName,
                                          String attributeName,
                                          Class<T> attributeClass)
Obtains a Deferred representing the value of an MBean attribute registered with the JMX infrastructure of the JavaApplication.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the MBean attribute
Parameters:
objectName - the name of the MBean defining the attribute
attributeName - the name of the MBean attribute
attributeClass - the Class of the MBean attribute
Returns:
a Deferred of type T for the attribute value

getMBeanAttribute

<T> T getMBeanAttribute(ObjectName objectName,
                        String attributeName,
                        Class<T> attributeClass)
Obtains the value of the specified MBean attribute registered with the JMX infrastructure of the JavaApplication.

If the JMX infrastructure in the JavaApplication is not yet available, it will block at wait for the default application timeout until it becomes available.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the MBean attribute
Parameters:
objectName - the name of the MBean defining the attribute
attributeName - the name of the MBean attribute
attributeClass - the Class of the MBean attribute
Returns:
the MBean attribute value
Throws:
ObjectNotAvailableException - when the specified MBean attribute or JMX server is not available

getDeferredMBeanProxy

<T> Deferred<T> getDeferredMBeanProxy(ObjectName objectName,
                                      Class<T> proxyClass)
Obtains a Deferred representing a local proxy to an MBean registered with the JMX infrastructure of the JavaApplication.

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
objectName - the name of the MBean
proxyClass - the type of the proxy
Returns:
a Deferred of type T

getMBeanProxy

<T> T getMBeanProxy(ObjectName objectName,
                    Class<T> clazz)
Obtains a local proxy of an MBean registered with the JMX infrastructure in the JavaApplication.

If the JMX infrastructure in the JavaApplication is not yet available, it will block and wait for the default application timeout until it becomes available.

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the MBean
Parameters:
objectName - the name of the MBean
clazz - the class of the proxy to create
Returns:
a proxy of type T
Throws:
ObjectNotAvailableException - when the specified MBean or JMX server is not available
UnsupportedOperationException - when JMX is not enabled for the JavaApplication

getDeferredMBeanInfo

Deferred<MBeanInfo> getDeferredMBeanInfo(ObjectName objectName)
Obtains a Deferred representing an MBeanInfo registered with the JMX infrastructure of the JavaApplication.

Parameters:
objectName - the name of the MBean
Returns:
a Deferred of an MBeanInfo

getMBeanInfo

MBeanInfo getMBeanInfo(ObjectName objectName)
Obtains the MBeanInfo of the specified MBean using the JMX infrastructure in the JavaApplication.

If the JMX infrastructure in the JavaApplication is not yet available, it will block at wait for the default application timeout until it becomes available.

Parameters:
objectName - the name of the MBean
Returns:
an MBeanInfo
Throws:
ObjectNotAvailableException - when the specified MBean is not available
UnsupportedOperationException - when JMX is not enabled for the JavaApplication

queryMBeans

Set<ObjectInstance> queryMBeans(ObjectName name,
                                QueryExp query)
Obtains a the result of an MBeans Query against the JMX infrastructure of the JavaApplication.

Parameters:
name - the object name pattern identifying the MBeans to be retrieved. If null or no domain and key properties are specified, all the MBeans registered will be retrieved
query - the query expression to be applied for selecting MBeans If null no query expression will be applied for selecting MBeans
Returns:
a Set of ObjectInstances

getRemoteJMXPort

int getRemoteJMXPort()
Obtains the configured JMX port of the application (which by definition is remote)

Returns:
Port Number
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - when JMX is not enabled on the JavaApplication

getRMIServerHostName

String getRMIServerHostName()
Obtains the configured RMI Server Host Name for the RMI server possibly running in the SimpleJavaApplication.

Returns:
String (null if not defined).
